author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Buttering the outside gives this sandwich a crunch that contrasts well with the melting cheese.
name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 60g grated good-quality strong cheese, such as Cheddar

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a griddle pan or large, cast-iron frying pan. Spread a little butter on one side of each slice of bread and griddle for 2 minutes, buttered-side down, until the bread is lightly toasted.
Remove the bread from the heat. Butter the other sides lightly, being sure to spread the butter all the way to the edges.

Turn the bread over to the lightly griddled side and spread the grated cheese evenly over one slice, then top it with the other slice, so that the pre-griddled sides are inside and the buttered ones outside.

Return the sandwich to the pan and griddle for 2-3 minutes on each side, pressing down lightly with a spatula to ensure that the cheese melts. The sandwich is ready when it is golden brown and crispy, and the cheese has melted. Serve alongside Creamy tomato soup with corn and pepper.
